letters.description: Assess the client's sexual history, values, beliefs, and relationship dynamics to establish a baseline understanding.
Explore past experiences, traumas, or challenges that may be impacting current sexual well-being and functioning.
Provide accurate and comprehensive sexual education, addressing myths, misconceptions, and promoting body literacy.
Facilitate awareness of the connection between mind, body, and emotions in relation to sexual experiences and desires.
Encourage mindful exploration of the senses to enhance pleasure, reduce anxiety, and cultivate body awareness.
Support clients in identifying, expressing, and exploring their authentic sexual desires and fantasies in a safe and consensual manner.
Focus on communication, intimacy, and connection within partnerships to foster fulfilling and mutually satisfying sexual experiences.
Integrate new awareness and skills into daily life, fostering ongoing growth, self-acceptance, and sustainable sexual well-being.
